Craft an item of type: pink_banner
inventory=[{"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 6, "index": 13}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "phantom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 52, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 5, "index": 38}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a pink_banner, I need to place 6 pink_wools in a banner pattern in the crafting table. To make the pink_wool, I need to combine pink_dye and white_wool. I will start by moving 1 pink_dye from slot 13 to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: pink_banner
inventory=[{"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "phantom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 52, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 5, "index": 38}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]
thought: To complete the pink_wool recipe, I need to place a white_wool next to the pink_dye. Therefore I will move 1 white_wool from slot 45 to slot 2 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: pink_banner

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: To craft a pink banner I need 6 pink wool blocks. However, I only have 1 pink wool block currently in my inventory (at slot 11), so I will need to craft 5 more. The recipe for pink wool requires 1 pink dye and 1 white wool. I have enough white wool (at slot 45) but not enough pink dye (at slot 13). Therefore, I will first need to move the pink dye into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: pink_banner

Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 2 with quantity 1
